channel.title: vmware on Boy's Life
channel.description: Recent content in vmware on Boy's Life

item.title: Vmware Freeze
item.description: Problem Host OS Win11 Guest OS Kubuntu 22.04 vmware vmware workstation pro 17.5 Every once in a while, my guest os went into a strange freezed state, where I could move the mouse, but the guest os just didn’t response. I used to monitor those logs under /var/log, and system resource usage with top command, but nothing was found, until I saw the following line in vmware.log. 12024-03-06T16:33:01.365Z In(05) mks VMMouse: Dropping move received while input queue was full This line was the last in the file, so it’s easy to find.
